live_updates: Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
48328.summary: Some customers in the Guildford area of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
48328.title: Apr 4 - Surrey (Guildford) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
